hours: The club is open Monday to Friday from 6:00 AM to 10:00 PM, and on weekends from 8:00 AM to 8:00 PM.
opening_hours: The club is open Monday to Friday from 6:00 AM to 10:00 PM, and on weekends from 8:00 AM to 8:00 PM.
entry_policy: Club entry is possible using the mobile app or a membership card. Each entry is registered in the system.
entry: You can enter the club using the mobile app or your membership card.
membership_price: Monthly memberships start from 139 PLN. Quarterly and annual plans are also available, with discounts for students and seniors.
membership_types: We offer Open, Off-Peak, Gym+Pool, and Family memberships. Details are available at reception and on our website.
membership: The club offers various membership options tailored to different needs.
carnet: Monthly, quarterly, and annual memberships are available.
payments: We accept card payments, BLIK, and recurring payments.
payment_methods: You can pay by card, BLIK, or via recurring payments.
contract_freeze: You can freeze your contract once per year for up to 30 days. The freeze fee is 29 PLN.
contract_termination: Contract termination requires signing a form at reception. The notice period is one month.
contract_transfer: Membership can be transferred to another person for an administrative fee of 39 PLN.
contract: All matters related to contracts are handled at the reception desk.
agreement: The membership agreement defines the terms of club usage.
classes_booking: Group classes can be booked via the mobile app or by contacting reception.
classes_cancellation: Classes can be canceled up to 2 hours before they start. After that, a fee applies according to the price list.
classes_limit: The number of spots in group classes is limited. Bookings are processed on a first-come, first-served basis.
classes: The club offers a wide range of group classes.
group_classes: Group classes are conducted according to the schedule available in the app.
instructors: Information about instructors can be found in the app or on the notice board near the fitness studio.
trainers: Our trainers conduct both group classes and personal training sessions.
personal_trainer: Personal training sessions can be booked at reception or directly with the selected trainer.
personal_trainer_prices: Personal training prices start from 120 PLN per session. Discounted packages are available.
pt: Personal training allows for an individually tailored workout plan.
pool_hours: The swimming pool is available daily from 6:00 AM to 9:30 PM. Last entry is 45 minutes before closing.
pool: The swimming pool is available daily for members.
swimming_pool: The swimming pool is located in the wet zone of the club.
sauna_hours: The sauna area is open from 2:00 PM to 10:00 PM on weekdays and from 10:00 AM to 8:00 PM on weekends.
sauna: The sauna area is available for members during designated hours.
sauna_zone: The sauna is located in the clubâ€™s wellness area.
locker_room: Lockers operate with a PIN code. If you forget your code, please contact reception.
lockers: Lockers are available in the changing rooms and secured with PIN codes.
showers: Showers are available without limits. Please use your own flip-flops.
changing_rooms: Changing rooms are equipped with showers and lockers.
towels: Towels are available at reception for an additional fee of 5 PLN. We recommend using a towel during workouts.
equipment_rules: Please return equipment to its place after use and disinfect machines after training.
equipment: Training equipment is available to all club members.
parking: Members receive 2 hours of free parking. Please collect a ticket upon entry and keep it until exit.
parking_info: The club offers up to 2 hours of free parking for members.
bike_racks: Bike racks are located in front of the club. Please secure your bike with your own lock.
bikes: You can access the club by bicycle.
kids_zone: The Kids Zone is open on Saturdays and Sundays from 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM. Children must be supervised by an adult.
children: Children are allowed in the club only under adult supervision.
age_policy: Persons under 16 years of age may use the club only under adult or trainer supervision.
rules: The club regulations are available on our website and at reception.
lost_items: Lost items can be collected at reception. Items are stored for 30 days.
maintenance: Current maintenance works and area closures are announced on the information board and in the app.
cleaning_breaks: Areas may be temporarily closed for cleaning. Information is provided in advance.
safety: In case of injury or discomfort, immediately inform staff. An AED defibrillator is located at reception.
wifi: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the club. Network name: FITNESS_WIFI, password: trening2024.
internet: Free Wi-Fi is available in the club.
invoices: You can receive an invoice for your membership at reception or by email upon request.
billing: Payment and invoice-related matters are handled by reception.
app_help: If you experience issues with the app, try updating it to the latest version or contact reception.
app: The mobile app allows class bookings and club entry.
smalltalk_how_are_you: Thanks, Iâ€™m doing well! ðŸ˜Š How can I assist you with the club?
smalltalk_who_are_you: I am the clubâ€™s virtual assistant. I help you quickly find information about hours, memberships, classes, and rules.
